name: Lunchbox Sandwich
description: Are you getting ready to go to school? Then don?t forget your lunchbox! Go to supermarket and get all you need for a school healthy snack. Then come back home and start cutting the salami, some cheese slices, a tomato, a cucumber, and a few salad leaves. Then toast some bread. Now you have everything you need to make your sandwich. Prepare a banana drink sweetened with honey and then put everything in your lunchbox, but don?t forget your apple! Have a great day at school!
